Entities.Name: Observation
Entities.Definition: Specific terms representing abnormal features, such as lesions and opacities in the image.

Sample Data.Annotated Sentence: A 3-cm increasing irregular nodule in the right upper lobe suggests lung cancer.

Entities.Name: Clinical Finding
Entities.Definition: Terms identified by the radiologists based on observation entities, representing suspected diseases.

Sample Data.Annotated Sentence: A 3-cm increasing irregular nodule in the right upper lobe suggests lung cancer.

Entities.Name: Anatomical Location Modifier
Entities.Definition: Describes the location of observations or clinical findings within the body.

Sample Data.Annotated Sentence: A 3-cm increasing irregular nodule in the right upper lobe suggests lung cancer.

Entities.Name: Certainty Modifier
Entities.Definition: Indicates the certainty level of an observation or clinical finding, including negation and uncertainty.

Entities.Name: Change Modifier
Entities.Definition: Describes the change in an observation over time, indicating progression, stability, or improvement.

Sample Data.Annotated Sentence: A 3-cm increasing irregular nodule in the right upper lobe suggests lung cancer.

Entities.Name: Characteristics Modifier
Entities.Definition: Describes the qualitative attributes of an observation, such as shape, density, or texture.

Sample Data.Annotated Sentence: A 3-cm increasing irregular nodule in the right upper lobe suggests lung cancer.

Entities.Name: Size Modifier
Entities.Definition: Indicates the size or dimensions of an observation in measurable terms.

Sample Data.Annotated Sentence: A 3-cm increasing irregular nodule in the right upper lobe suggests lung cancer.

Dataset.Name: Osaka University Hospital Chest CT Report Dataset
Dataset.Details: A dataset consisting of 118,078 annotated chest CT reports from 2010 to 2018, used for training and evaluating clinical term extraction models.
Dataset.Link: Supplementary material mentioned in the paper.

Annotation Guidelines.Description: Guidelines for annotating clinical terms in radiology reports, defining observations, findings, and various modifiers.
